title: BodyColors
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: BodyColors
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  For a Humanoid character, the BodyColors will specify the colors for the
  different body parts.
description: |
  BodyColors is a utility object used by Roblox to load avatar body colors from
  the website. Avatars that are loaded from the website will automatically have
  a BodyColors object corresponding to said avatar's body color configuration.
  When parented inside of a character with a Class.Humanoid, it will apply the
  colors to each specified limb.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - CharacterAppearance
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: BodyColors.HeadColor
    summary: |
      Sets the color of the head, as a Datatype.BrickColor.
    description: |
      Sets the color of the head, as a Datatype.BrickColor.

      Setting this will also set Class.BodyColors.HeadColor3.
    codesamples: []
    type: BrickColor
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: false
    capabilities:
      - Avatar
